plot outline: Lucky Kapoor (Fardeen Khan) lives in Australia and has no interest in taking over his father's business in India. Saba Karim Khan (Feroz Khan) has a great interest in the property, but Mr. Kapoor has no interest in selling the business to Khan. So Khan has Mr. Kapoor killed, making it look like an accident. Jessica Periera (Jaitley), a childhood sweetheart of Lucky, has proof that Mr. Kapoor's death was an accident--but she keeps it to herself. When Karim Khan meets with Lucky to renegotiate, he finds that Lucky is willing to sell--but he also discovers that Lucky bears a striking resemblance to Karim Khan's own dead son. Although Karim Khan will do anything to make Lucky heir to his own wealth and properties, Lucky is not willing to do so.
title: Janasheen
plot: Lucky Kapoor (Fardeen Khan) lives in Australia and has no interest in taking over his father's business in India. Saba Karim Khan (Feroz Khan) has a great interest in the property, but Mr. Kapoor has no interest in selling the business to Khan. So Khan has Mr. Kapoor killed, making it look like an accident. Jessica Periera (Jaitley), a childhood sweetheart of Lucky, has proof that Mr. Kapoor's death was an accident--but she keeps it to herself. When Karim Khan meets with Lucky to renegotiate, he finds that Lucky is willing to sell--but he also discovers that Lucky bears a striking resemblance to Karim Khan's own dead son. Although Karim Khan will do anything to make Lucky heir to his own wealth and properties, Lucky is not willing to do so.::gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com

Multi-millionaire business man, Virendra Kapoor lives with his ailing wife, Jenny and a son, Lucky. Due to unforeseen circumstances Lucky is forced to migrate to Australia to live under his aunt, Martha's care. Years later after Jenny's death Virendra would like Lucky to return back to India in order to take care of his businesses but Lucky is least interested and wants to continue living life the way he wants. Meanwhile Virendra is approached by Saba Karim Shah on several occasions who is willing to stake any amount of currency to purchase his properties but Virendra is not willing to sell under any conditions forcing Karim Shah to kill him making it look like an accident. Then Lucky returns to India to investigate his dad's death only to meet his childhood sweetheart, Jessica Pereira and they fall in love. Ironically Karim Shah decides to make Lucky his son since he resembles his very own son that was killed in riots years back while at the same time Karim Shah is able to purchase Virendra's properties from Lucky. Hell breaks loose when Jessica claims she is an eye witness in the Virendra's murder case upturning the relationship between Karim Shah and Lucky.::gavin (racktoo@hotmail.com)

Australian based Lucky Kapoor (Fardeen Khan) has no interest whatsoever in his dad's, Virendra Kapoor's (Harsh Chhaya) business in India. Saba Karim Khan (Feroz Khan), however, does have an interest in the property of Mr. Kapoor, but Mr. Kapoor is not willing to sell. This angers Karim Khan, and he has Mr. Kapoor killed, and makes it look like an accident. Lucky's childhood sweetheart, Jessica Periera (Celina Jaitley), has the proof of Mr. Kapoor's death, but decides to keep it to herself. When Karim Khan meets with Lucky to re-negotiate the property, he finds that Lucky is willing to sell; he also finds that Lucky resembles his dead son. Karim Khan will give anything to make Lucky the heir to his vaste wealth and properties, but Lucky is not willing. Karim Khan turns on all the machinations he has in his power to force Lucky to be his heir.::rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)
